Entries.winter_Fri8: As much as I love Emily, sometimes I wish I could convince her to check in with me before she, like, knits me an entire ill-fitting sweater again.$s#$b#I love her, but that's just not my style, you know?

Entries.summer_Mon6: Gosh, it's so hot out today.$s
Entries.5{{YearRemainder}}: Emily made a lovely looking lace dress the other day. I've been dying to ask her if I can try it on...
Entries.6{{YearRemainder}}: I ordered a dress online but it's a size too big. Now I'll need to go to the post office to return it.$s

Entries.summer_Mon6: Does this dress look good on me?
Entries.summer_Tue8: Ah, the weather is lovely today, @!$h#$b#Kinda want to go camping, do you think I could convince Emily to take a day off work?
Entries.1_2: Mother sent me some photos from her vacation.#$b#They're taking a cruise out of %place.#$e#Go with them?...I...I'm not sure about that.
Entries.3_2: Hey @, Father sent me a gift card to the athleisure store in %place. Wanna go check it out?
Entries.5_2: @, what do you think of this new foundation? Mother bought it for me.
Entries.7_2: Mother's thinking of getting her nose re-done. Again.#$e#Me? Have I considered getting any work done? I don't think I need it.#$e#I'm not against plastic surgery, I just think I don't need it.
Entries.9_2: @, I swear even expensive clothing is shoddily made these days.$s
Entries.11_2: To be honest, @, one of the reasons why I own so much clothing is so I can avoid doing laundry so often.
Entries.13_2: I love how my skin looks today! @, this blush is doing amazing things for my complexion.
Entries.15_2: Look at this new dress my mother sent me! Isn't it flattering?$h
Entries.17_2: Father got me a gift card to {{i18n:clothing.brand.{{Random:01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, 07, 08}} }}. Emily and I are thinking of heading over, perhaps some time this week?
Entries.19_2: Look, @, I managed to cook something! Emily says mom and dad would be very proud of me.$h#$b#Want some?[194]
Entries.22_2: What did I want to be when I was young? I really wanted to be a ballerina.#$b#I know, I know. I gave that up when I learned what type of toll that took on their feet.
Entries.24_2: I can't find my favorite sunscreen.$s#$e#Hey. Good sunscreen is expensive, and I don't like the cheap ones, they feel like a sticky film on my skin.
Entries.26_2: My mother sent me a new hair serum. She swears by it.
Entries.27_2: Maybe I should take a class about photography? Emily thinks it'd be good for me...
Entries.28_2: I've been thinking of picking up a foreign language...#$b#I was never very good at that in school, though.

Entries.summer_Tue8: I would love an iced coffee right about now...
Entries.winter_Tue8: Brr! It's so cold, I wish I had a new jacket.
Entries.1_2: Emily asked me to photograph some of her designs the other day.#$b#She certainly has an unique style, but it works well for her.$h
Entries.2_2: I found this flower the other day while I was out taking pictures. Isn't it beautiful?[421]%revealtasteHaley421
Entries.4_2: Maybe if I rearranged my closet I could get all my dresses to fit?
Entries.5_2: I love this new foundation, but the shade range is so terribly narrow.$s
Entries.6_2: When I was little, I wanted to be a model.#$b#Still kinda do, to be honest.
Entries.7_2: In a real way, I do feel like time is slipping away from me.#$b#I'm not sure what I can do in this little town.
Entries.9_2: I can't find my favorite pair of shoes. I have no clue where I put them.
Entries.10_2: Do you like my new blush, @? Tell me, do you think cool pinks suit me?
